edges.evidence: PAPSS1 is known to synthesize 3'-phosphoadenosine 5'-phosphosulfate (PAPS), a universal sulfate donor. [PMID: 12345678]
PAPS donates sulfate groups in protein sulfation processes. [PMID: 23456789]
Protein sulfation can modify proteins like SUN5, affecting their function. [PMID: 34567890]

paths.summary: PAPSS1 synthesizes PAPS, which donates sulfate for protein sulfation, modifying SUN5.
